name: accountPlanBaseDelete
description:
[Cancel a base plan](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203634215-How-Do-I-Cancel-My-Subscription-) for a sub account. This API can only be used by master accounts that pay all billiing charges of their associated Pro or higher sub accounts. Zoom allows only [approved partners](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/master-account-apis) to use master APIs and manage sub accounts' subscriptions. Email the partner programs team at **partner-success@zoom.us** for more details.

**Scopes**: `billing:master`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Heavy`
**Prerequisites:**
* The sub account must have a Pro or a higher plan.

action.description: The action that needs to be taken for this sub account. Value must be set to "cancel".

comment.description: Additional comments about the cancellation decision.

reason.description:
The reason for the cancellation of plan. Reason options:
`1` - I am no longer working remote.
`2` - I had challenges getting the support I needed.
`3` - Features in the Basic Free Plan are sufficient.
`4` - The expense is too high.
`5` - I purchased the wrong product.
`6` - Paid purchase not needed right now, will repurchase in the future.
